career.title: Frontend Engineer
description: Customized dynamic templates to integrate third-party WYSIWYG editors, fitting diverse institutional requirements across multiple client use cases, improved overall user experience using CMS and JSON for backend data structuring.
Provided client-facing technical support, resolving complex production-level issues and managing the ticketing/help desk system to ensure SLAs and customer satisfaction targets were consistently met.
Actively helped the business and sales team with technical product understandings to more accurately help users for individual use cases.

Developed reusable, configurable UI components using Vue, Vuetify, vite,  and javascript, enabling advanced filtering capabilities with a focus on modular design to ensure code maintainability across projects.

career.title: Software Engineer
description: Implemented sophisticated metric measurement tools using Vue and React, seamlessly integrating them with backend APIs powered by Rails and AWS, which enhanced student and faculty engagement by 20%, demonstrating a keen ability to drive meaningful user interaction and system effectiveness.

Revamped and designed a greenfield student assessment platform from the ground up using the Vue, Material UI, HTML, CSS and typescript, skillfully integrating it within iframes and handling state management and data with Pinia all backed by Git, Github, Jira, and CI/CD pipelines.

Proposed, developed, and delivered an internal tool during a hackathon, achieving a 70% reduction in debugging time and a 35% increase in team productivity, showcasing an ability to identify and address critical inefficiencies, driving substantial improvements in team productivity.

Played a key role in developing courseware that positively impacted 40,000 students' academic development, earning recognition from the Gates Foundation, highlighting commitment to creating solutions that drive significant educational outcomes and garner industry acknowledgment.

career.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Played a crucial role in full-stack development using Agile/Lean methodologies with tools such as Webstorm, Jira, NodeJS, Angular and Cypress, collaborating closely with the team to drive successful project outcomes and robust test automation.
Identified and implemented innovative test automation strategies to enhance story execution, significantly improving testing efficiency and coverage.
Applied test-driven development principles to both team processes and feature implementation, ensuring high code quality and reliability.
Effectively communicated with team members and business stakeholders to design and deliver new features, ensuring alignment with strategic goals and user needs.
Engineered key features for web applications used by internal business users, optimizing functionality and supporting critical business operations.
Mentored two IT interns and provided strategic guidance to an intern project team developing an internal application using the MEAN stack, fostering their growth and successful project completion.

aboutMe:
I'm a Software Engineer that loves to bring ideas to life since 2019.

"Form follows function" - Louis Sullivan, an American architect.
This quote encapsulate my approach to implementation. Establishing function is the start of a great foundation; at this point in technology design is limited by our imagination.

"Coding is a form of art where the tools are constantly changing and new mediums are created every day." - a quote by me, actually, I'm not sure, I've lived on the internet for so long I don't know what's original anymore... â˜º
